name: Flint
headline: Securing Nurses for Your Future
description: We help hospitals 🏥 hire nurses 🧑🏻‍⚕️ from all around the world 🌏 and with technology make the complexity of immigration and licensing simple.

founders.name: Kenton Jarvie, Founder
founders.description: Kenton is a blend of business acumen and liberal arts. He prioritizes people and relationships, aiming to improve the lives of nurses and their communities around the world! Kenton's vision for Flint demonstrates that empathetic entrepreneurship can bring about significant positive change.

founders.name: Anson Kung, Founder
founders.description: We help hospitals 🏥 hire nurses 🧑🏻‍⚕️ from all around the world 🌏 and with technology make the complexity of immigration and licensing simple.

generated_description:
Flint, founded in 2021 and based in San Francisco, emerged out of the necessity to simplify healthcare hiring processes, particularly for nurses. Their mission—"Securing Nurses for Your Future"—reflects a dual focus: helping hospitals recruit qualified nurses globally while navigating the often complex waters of immigration and licensing. They utilize technology to streamline these processes, making it easier for healthcare institutions to connect with the right nursing talent and for individuals to pursue opportunities in the U.S.

Part of the Y Combinator Batch S20, Flint has a passionate team of 20 employees dedicated to this cause. Their platform caters specifically to three main groups: hospitals looking for efficient hiring solutions, nurses seeking job opportunities, and asylum seekers who are also navigating the path to work in healthcare. 

If you're part of a hospital looking to eliminate reliance on staffing agencies or a nurse hoping to secure a Green Card sponsorship, Flint positions itself as a valuable partner. They offer tailored resources for both parties—facilitating smoother transitions and better outcomes.

For more information, check out their website at [flintnurse.com](https://flintnurse.com). With just under two years in operation, Flint is paving the way for a more agile and inclusive future in healthcare staffing.
